rukus.text: Nos dedit Moses scripture appointed his frater Aaron est his adjutor
Nos dictus Iit ambo vos to people rejected noster revelations subsequently nos utterly annihilated rejectors
Similarly when people Noah disbelieved messengers nos drowned them nos set them prout signum people Nos prepared transgressors painful retribution
Alias â€˜Aad Thamoud habitans Al-Russ multus generations them
To each de these groups nos delivered sufficient examples ante nos annihilated them
They passed community est showered cum miserable shower (Sodom). they non vide it fact est they nunquam believed in resurrection
When they vide vos they semper ridiculed vos hoc 1 chosen DEUS Est est messenger
He fere diverted nos noster deus non est nos steadfastly persevered them. They testimentum certainly invenit out, when they vide retribution est real strayers ex path
Vos vide unus deus habuit est his suus ego? Vos est his advocate
Vos think ut multus perfecit them hear understand They est just animals; non they est far malus
